# availableJointNames

**Instance Property**

The names of the available joints in the observation.

## Declaration

```swift
var availableJointNames: [VNAnimalBodyPoseObservation.JointName] { get }
```

## Accessing Points

- **VNAnimalBodyPoseObservation.JointName**: The joint names for an animal body pose.
- **availableJointGroupNames**: The available joint group names in the observation.
- **VNAnimalBodyPoseObservation.JointsGroupName**: The joint group names for an animal body pose.
- **recognizedPoint(_:)**: Returns the point for a joint name the observation recognizes.
- **recognizedPoints(_:)**: Returns the points for a joint group name the observation recognizes.
